Class VirtualDiskBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • Program.VirtualDiskBlock

  • public class VirtualDiskBlock
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Jariel Class that contains the implementation of a virtual disk block

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VirtualDiskBlock()
      Default constructor construct a virtual block of 256 bytes

      Construct a virtual block with the given capacity
